name: Arctic Walrus Survival Simulator 3D
description:
Enjoy the life of a large fanged Arctic seal – the walrus! Survive at the harsh and cruel place full of hungry predators! Rush across the arctic plains, swim the cold waters of the polar sea, mate with females of your species, raise cubs and defense them from other predators with Arctic Walrus Survival Simulator 3D!
Feel as a strong and powerful animal! Mind your hunger and a health indicator – if one of them drops, your chances to survive the winter would fell too. Collect coins and buy power-ups – it could help you to survive! Eat plenty of food, collect fat and don’t be scared by the frost! Catch fish and avoid meeting with polar explorers!
Snowed plains of Arctic - the cruel and unfriendly place - filled with different animals. Some of them can be your meal, but others are your direct rivals! Protect your life and territory from other seals and predators, earn experience and raise up your skills. Plunge into the winter atmosphere exploring the arctic world with Arctic Walrus Survival Simulator 3D!
Arctic Walrus Survival Simulator 3D features:
Ultimate arctic water mammal simulator
Explore arctic world without leaving your room
Unusual and interesting missions
Aggressive arctic animals as your enemies
Swim through the Arctic Ocean and enjoy the beautiful underwater world - try Arctic Walrus Survival Simulator 3D!
